title: Child Among 3 Shot In Altadena
content:
ALTADENA (CBSLA.com) — Authorities say three people, including a child, were shot in Altadena on Tuesday.
The situation was unfolding at the corner of Figueroa Drive and Olive Avenue, though few details were known.
At least one person was rushed to a hospital from the scene. Additional ambulances have been dispatched to the area.
An investigation was underway.
This is a breaking news report. More information will be provided as it becomes available.
